allow:
Bash(git -C /Users/benmathes/coding/benmathes.github.io commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add CLEAR equity calculator to projects

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/benmathes/coding/benmathes.github.io commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign site with Swiss/Bauhaus-inspired styling

- Space Grotesk typography with bold headlines
- Dark/light mode via system preference
- Subtle hover animations \(waving Hi, sliding arrows, expanding underlines\)
- High contrast cool color palette
- Clean grid layout with section dividers

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/benmathes/coding/benmathes.github.io commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add headshot photo to intro section

- Slightly desaturated by default, full color on hover
- Subtle rotation animation on hover
- Responsive flex layout with text

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
